text: Emmett Chapman (September 28, 1936 â€“ November 1, 2021)Emmett Chapman, musician and inventor of the Chapman Stick, dies at 85 was an American jazz musician. He was best known as the inventor of the Chapman Stick. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biographical website * Stick Enterprises * Interview at Mel Bay Guitar Sessions * Documentary by Dan Chapman * Interview at NAMM Oral History Library (2011) Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American songwriters Category:American inventors Category:American guitarists
title: Emmett Chapman
